resources.string: A door with that name already exists.
You have no doors registered. Please add at least one before trying to set access.
You have no users registered. Please add at least one before trying to set access.
Select the door you want to change permissions for:
Check/uncheck the users whom you want to change permissions for:
It was not possible to change permissions for this door/user.
Select the door you wish to open:
You must select a user and a door.
